Header.title: Get a pro braider at your doorstep
Header.paragraph: Expert Braiders, Just a Doorbell Away

About.paragraph: Liz here, I started braiding hair as a side hustle while studying at CCRl. Creative, proficient, and passionate, I quickly mastered the craft and even began teaching others about hair care and styling.  For the past 10 years, I've been a successful braider in the greater Providence area.  Growing up here, I initially pursued a career in healthcare, but eventually decided to combine my love for hair with my healthcare background to create Majestic Braids.  I've always loved working with hair, and it's incredibly rewarding to know that my passion helps people feel confident.
Why: Experienced: 10 years braiding in Providence means fast, efficient service and expertise with all hair types.
Passionate: I love braiding, so you get top-quality care and attention to detail.
Why2: Local: I know Providence and understand our community's hair needs.
Expert: My teaching background means I can help you maintain healthy hair and braids.

Services.name: Box Braids
Services.text: Individual braids that are sectioned off in a box-like pattern. They can be any length or thickness and are a very popular protective style.

Services.name: Cornrows
Services.text: Braids that are close to the scalp and can be styled in various patterns. They are often used as a base for other styles like weaves or wigs.

Services.name: Senegalese Twists
Services.text: Two-strand twists that are made with synthetic braiding hair. They are a lightweight and stylish option.

Services.name: Micro Braids
Services.text: Very small braids that can be styled in a variety of ways. They are a time-consuming style but offer a lot of versatility.

Services.name: Faux Locs
Services.text: Braids that are wrapped to resemble dreadlocks. They are a protective style that gives the look of locs without the commitment.

Services.name: Weaves
Services.text: Hair extensions that are sewn or glued onto the natural hair. Want to add length, volume, or color?

Testimonials.text: Liz is amazing! I've been going to her for years now, and my braids always look perfect. She's so fast and efficient, and she really cares about the health of my hair.  Plus, she's just a lovely person to chat with. Highly recommend!
Testimonials.name: Maria S.

Testimonials.text: I was nervous about trying braids for the first time, but Liz made the whole experience so comfortable. She took the time to explain everything and gave me great advice on how to care for my hair. I'm so happy with the results! My braids are beautiful, and I feel so confident.
Testimonials.name: Ashley J.

Testimonials.text: Majestic Braids is the best!  Liz is a true artist.  I always get compliments on my hair, and it's all thanks to her.  Her prices are reasonable, and her shop is clean and welcoming. I wouldn't go anywhere else.
Testimonials.name: Keisha B.

Testimonials.text: Majestic Braids is the best!  Liz is a true artist.  I always get compliments on my hair, and it's all thanks to her.  Her prices are reasonable, and her shop is clean and welcoming. I wouldn't go anywhere else.
Testimonials.name: Sarah L.

Testimonials.text: I love that Liz is so knowledgeable about hair care.  She gave me some great tips on how to keep my braids looking fresh and healthy.  She's also very professional and always on time.  I appreciate her attention to detail and her commitment to providing excellent service.
Testimonials.name: David R.

Testimonials.text: Five stars for Majestic Braids!  Liz is fantastic.  She's friendly, talented, and passionate about her work.  I always leave her shop feeling like a million bucks.  If you're looking for a skilled braider in Providence, look no further!
Testimonials.name: Tiffany A.
